website_summaries.verdict: This lithium-ion compact right angle drill comes equipped with advanced technology and features.
pros: Dual speed ranges make the drill a great choice for a variety of applications
Compact 4 inch front to back length
Compatible with several types of DEWALT batteries
cons: Not strong enough to use with a ship-auger

customer_reviews.title: Nice drill but no hard case.  Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine and it came with a tool bag instead of the hard case that it's supposed to come with. The actual seller was Amazon. This item is very confusing. The DeWalt website states and shows a hard kitbox not a bag. Everywhere I look online it shows the hard case. So it appears the same model number comes different ways. I contacted DeWalt and complained. They are sending me a hard case for free. Maybe Black and Decker can add some info as to why the different cases. I do like the drill. Maybe they should have a different model number for the different cases.
customer_reviews.author: JCW

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tool very much. But it came in a soft case, not the hard case pictured. I could have bought the same tool at Lowe's for a few dollars less but I decided to purchase this one because of the hard case. I am extremely unhappy with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Killian

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend picked it out, so it was just what he wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to put a little basket in the bathroom next to the sink to keep my Readers Digest magazines close by :) and in trying to attach the basket, it was difficult due to the way the screw had to be inserted in the space. This would have made the job so much easier. We found it and bought it about 3 days later, but for the next job in the garage, it worked perfectly. It came with a battery, charger, storage bag all for a price less than the same item at Lowes that did NOT include the bag, battery or charger---it was the unit only.
customer_reviews.author: TexasRose

customer_reviews.title: I tried to make due with one of those right angle adaptors for my regular drill and hated every minute of using them
customer_reviews.text: For years, I tried to make due with one of those right angle adaptors for my regular drill and hated every minute of using them. They are awkward and can be unsafe. Additionally, they do not accept regular drill bits - only hex bits. Since I purchased this drill a few months ago, I have used it on several screwing/drilling projects around my home where a standard drill will not fit. I am sure that it has its limitations, but it has performed well (good control and plenty of power) and has been a pleasure to use. I definitely recommend this tool for your home workshop. I wish I had one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard J. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description
customer_reviews.text: The drill is fine. The seller displayed a picture of the drill with a hard case. They delivered the drill with a soft case. Clearly the hard case is better than the soft case but the seller chose to send the, less expensive, soft case instead without prior notification. Truly a case of bait & switch. I kept the product but feel it's important to inform others. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, Great deal
customer_reviews.text: A battery Right Angle drill is a must have for anybody that works in tight locations. I happened to catch this drill for less than $100 and normally its around $180. The battery it comes with does not last long but it uses the other dewalt 20v batteries as well. You cant beat the deal, drill, bag, charger, battery and Phillips bit all for less than $100! Best tool deal I've ever scored
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: Please remove the picture of the hard case IF you aren't going to send a hard case with the drill.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Diva

customer_reviews.title: Allows to reach where standard drill can't
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this tool for almost 4 years at my workplace. It never let me down. Recently I decided to get one for my personal use to work on some projects at home including fastening narrow and long mailbox to the pole. Drill has two settings, one allows me for better torque control but with lower RPM's. Another runs higher RPM but less control instead. Whether it is small job like a mailbox or large like working to fix your staircase. Dewalt is the right tool for the job. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Item was advertised with Hard Case...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my order. This product was advertised with a Hard Case. But instead it came with a canvas bag. Will leave a review of this product on a later time. .. Did not come with Hard Case. July 8 2020... Today I received The Replacement from the seller. It is the same kit. No Hard case totally disappointed with this purchase. I was told that the replacement will have a HardCase.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Rocillo

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: THis has lots of power. I just used it to screw in replacement boards on my deck. I love that it comes with the battery and charger too. THe grip is easy, it is a little heavy for me but my husband will have no problem using it. It doesn't take a chuck to replace tips either which is nice since he has a habit of loosing them. Two speeds in nice too. It comes in a nice case also that has room if you have an extra battery too.
customer_reviews.author: shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable grip, good lighting, decent torque
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any prior experience with a right angle drill and 20v drills in general. I found the torque to be very good, and much better than what I was used to with my current dewalt drill. The compact head allows access to some tight spots with sufficient torque to drill some decent 1 inch wood holes.
customer_reviews.author: Garibaldi

customer_reviews.title: Not the drill for construction work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the drill to help when im working on transformers. This drill doesn't have the power to take out 3/4 bolts without loosing them first and sometimes it still couldnt finish the job. On the other hand it can tighten bolt but still u will have to go back by hand and get it reall snug.
customer_reviews.author: cleveland roundtree lll

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and use in hard to get to spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent right angle drill as are all Dewalt products I own. Originally purchased this to get into a tight space to drill out a broken bolt in a differential cover. Works well, plenty of speed or power. Runs several hours of intermittent use before needing recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Made in China,worked total only 30 min( 3days) and chuck locked
customer_reviews.author: Latchezar Milkov

customer_reviews.title: It's a DeWalt what else needs to be said
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool lots of power lots of torque nice Chuck easy to use the only complaint I have is if you use it for a long time it does get hot and blows hot air on your hand besides that I would not hesitate to buy this tool
customer_reviews.author: Gleamin Demon

customer_reviews.title: It Became a Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: The drill is exactly what I wanted but the wrong size. I wanted a 1/2" not 3/8" drill. So. rather than go through the return process, I'm giving it to my son for Christmas. I'm sure he'll enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n Jim

customer_reviews.title: Tried to pull a fast one!!
customer_reviews.text: description said i was buying a NEW li-ion drill, what i recieved was and OLD beat up 18v ni-cad drill in new packaging. it even had the 20v li-ion packaging. Very deceptive. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: john curtis

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: to me,this is a win win situation,tool fits great,has 2000 max rpms comes with case,batery,an charger,tool has been used lightly but very happy so far
customer_reviews.author: ald

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cordless drill for the first time in a tight space which I intended to use when the need arises and I was very satisfied. I expect the battery to be on par with the rest of my Dewalt cordless tool.
customer_reviews.author: Herminio C. Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with hard case as advertised...comes with soft case.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Montenare

customer_reviews.title: Great drill / Junk soft case delivered
customer_reviews.text: The drill seems to be working well, but as others have said the seller is substituting an absolutely worthless soft case instead of delivering the quality hard case as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Okay - it did not come with the storage box, but I did not buy a storage box. I bought a drill and used it all day doing some tough drilling work to mount shocks on our fifth wheel camper. This drill worked great!! It is as tough as all the other Dewalt tools I own.
customer_reviews.author: Chip G

customer_reviews.title: A great tool and works in those hard to get to spots.
customer_reviews.text: This may seem like a frivolous tool but when it is needed there is no tool that works as well as this one, I got it during a kitchen remodel and have since used it in so many situations where it is the tool that just works and works well. It is great for tight spots and has the torque to get screws in or out of almost any spot.
customer_reviews.author: Stever521

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Champ
customer_reviews.text: Purchased ro replace an old nicad battery Dewalt angle head drill....which was still working fine. However the old nicad batteries were shot. Wanted to upgrade ro lithium. Used the new lithium drill numerous time and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any tool collection
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this drill to my other dewalt drill. It’s so easy to get into tight spaces and performs incredibly well.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Nice Drill
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a close quarters drill and I like this one! 2 speed and compact in the right places! Lots of power and works well!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt 20Volt Dril
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work and have been waiting for the price to drop to pick this up for home. It did and I jumped. The drill is awesome, There are different Amphour batteries you can pick up depending on the job you are doing. The quick release chuck is awesome and really quick. If you get one drill this year make it this 90 degree hand handhold, 20Volt, 1.5Ahr sleek, slim designed killer drill.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Right angle
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for me. It makes it so much easier to get in to tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Dot Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Greeat Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Good ergonomics, plenty of power, really handy for those tight spots.
customer_reviews.author: MTRCTYLARRY

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent. Comes with drill n battery n case n charger
customer_reviews.text: 100% great quality great tool. Battery life long . Super happy I bought this. Came with drill n battery and case. If your looking for a right angle drill. I would buy this money well spent. Best drill I have
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: versatile tool
customer_reviews.text: Typical great Dewalt quality. Versatile to use not only for drilling but as a small grinder or sander with appropriate accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Mariellen Reiber

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DCD740C1 20-Volt MAX Li-Ion Compact Right Angle
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I seen this drill in action on You-Tube, I wanted one. I've had so many tight spots where this drill has saved the day, that it has paid for its self already.. I learned quick that this drill has some good power and it can rap your knuckles if you aren't careful. Another win for Dewalt!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Dubois

customer_reviews.title: 3/8" throat
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice to get my nail eater in there. Something i neglected to check. But nice tool for being chinese.
customer_reviews.author: JamzM

customer_reviews.title: Another great DEWALT tool!
customer_reviews.text: As usual, the DEWALT product performed to expectations. This tool worked great out of the box. It would have been nice to have a larger capacity battery, but I did purchase a more powerful battery to go along with the one included.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eichelberg

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt right angle drill
customer_reviews.text: Love dewalt. Need big hands, does the job. Especially good for short spaces.
customer_reviews.author: ros

customer_reviews.title: gets in tight spots
customer_reviews.text: couldn't find at other tool places. thanks amazon. works great
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS w

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to install overhead vents with screws. Now I'm finding more and more uses.
customer_reviews.author: Maxie

customer_reviews.title: no bad comments.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and well packaged, does the job as advertised, no bad comments.
customer_reviews.author: walter m bowden

customer_reviews.title: More useful than I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for one job, to drill through the headers at the eaves in my attic for wiring installations... it has proven to be useful throughout the house. Installing hardware in tight spots in kitchen cabinets, tightening mounting screws while stacking a washer and dryer were in place against a wall and screwdriver couldn't have enough torque, working in tight spaces on a vehicle, etc. I LOVE this tool.
customer_reviews.author: MaverickH1

customer_reviews.title: It's a DeWalt. Of course it's great.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome 90o Drill! Great for tight spots. Plenty of power. It's a DeWalt. Buy with confidence. It is a little heavy, but hey.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Dean

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My brother-in-law calls it a hammer head because of its power. We used it when removing screws on my car. Since then I have bought various adapters so I can use it for just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice when you need it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely gets into tight places.. Nice when you need it. Would not make it my prime tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: I Love you DeWalt!!
customer_reviews.text: I think the review title will give away my review... I love this thing!! Torque is excellent, and the 20v battery lasts and lasts! The head is small enough to get into the inside of electrical panels and other tight spaces. Can't go wrong with this right angle!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Belliston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool and works perfect for the application at hand
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool and works perfect for the application at hand!! Nice bright LED light by the chuck when you pull the trigger making it easy to see when using it! Another quality tool by Dewalt!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua E.

customer_reviews.title: Great drill but underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Battery supplied too weak for substantial jobs. Wrongly assumed it would take a 1/2" bit. Otherwise, light weight and a great tool for tight jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite tool, does everything it should and some more
customer_reviews.author: Vincent R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: how did I live so long without one of these...
customer_reviews.author: TheDynoGuy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend really loved this drill! He uses it all the time. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 90 degree angle Dewalt drill!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great tool, and it's a dewalt !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest F. Carneau

customer_reviews.title: nice for using in tight places good drill
customer_reviews.text: AD is misleading it shows a picture of a hard case but I received a soft case. That was one of the reasons I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Powell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great right angle drill! Another quality DeWalt product. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great drill has plenty of power and not to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: josiah

customer_reviews.title: Item was delivered on time and is an awesome tool to have
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered on time and is an awesome tool to have. It helps alot with hard to get to spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Supercharged

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull for a battery drill.
customer_reviews.text: Right angle design has many uses but not for everything. Excellent special purpose and second drill, not your primary drill. Battery life in use unknown.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K. McCann

customer_reviews.title: Bought it used and works and looks like brand new
customer_reviews.text: never knew how much and how helpful this is. Bought it used and works and looks like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerR Miles

customer_reviews.title: Nice drill
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy drill to have on the job site. I’d recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and powerful. I purchased it as a kit. I only wish that they make it available with a spare battery.Excellent
customer_reviews.author: david aponte

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty unit as you can tell by its weight. The gear box has a high and low speed with of course variable speed power for each.
customer_reviews.author: Engelands

customer_reviews.title: battery does not last long
customer_reviews.text: battery was dead after about 25 sheet metal screws after a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: shilling

customer_reviews.title: my husband loved it! he has been using about every other ...
customer_reviews.text: my husband loved it! he has been using about every other day since he got it.
customer_reviews.author: catfish annie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for small bits up to 5/8s. Does not do so great with making 2" holes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great drill at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I did some looking around and Amazon had the best price that included the storage case and battery. Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Troy M Graham

customer_reviews.title: I needed to place a screw in a tight space ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to place a screw in a tight space, so I purchased this right-angled drill. It worked perfectly. I could not have completed the task without this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisment
customer_reviews.text: Tool bag arrived instead of a hard storage case with handle.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Thao

customer_reviews.title: I like this drill for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I like this drill for what it is, but would add to what others have said only in this respect: under heavy continuous load or use, a fully charged battery will only last 15 minutes or so before it wilts.
customer_reviews.author: maxv

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful. Fits in tight spaces. Battery lasts ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful. Fits in tight spaces. Battery lasts a long time before needing a recharge. Recharges fast. Well worth the price. Just what I would expect from DEWALT!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome J Poplawski, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt Compact Right Angle Drill
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the product's performance and gets into tighter spaces than others claim. Would recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Smiling Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Right angle drill is way more better than a normal drill. DeWalt is always great quality
customer_reviews.author: Miroslav Kamis

customer_reviews.title: Powerful drill.
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my hand tools. Very powerful. The light is a good feature. It could be improved by loosing some weight.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: JR Mor
customer_reviews.text: good in tight places and have used in close area
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power and clearance for all my needs and ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power and clearance for all my needs and seems to be built just as well as all my other dewalt tools.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Latora

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: Weight nicely balanced. Very low profile allows drilling in tight places. Powerful 20 volt motor. Clearly a five-star tool.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I particularly like the high speed. It makes this drill much more versatile. The locking chuck makes it very easy to secure bits.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. 20v plenty of power for what i ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. 20v plenty of power for what i need it for.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: but glad I acquired it
customer_reviews.text: A little bit heavier, but glad I acquired it. Should of had one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: jim raczkowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tool
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe it took me so long to get one of these right angel drills! This Dewalt has amazing power and you can get into areas that are impossible with an ordinary drill. The battery life is very good and it charges quickly when you do need to charge. Anyone who took the time to buy a nice tool box should definitely take the time to put one of these in it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Low torque
customer_reviews.text: Drill was very nice to hold and operates very well. It seemed very well made and sturdy. It let me drill some holes in studs for electrical wiring that I could not have drilled with a standard drill due to the angle head However it was disappointing in the torque that it delivered. It had trouble driving screws into wood where my regular battery drill (Hitachi 18 Volt) had no problems. This drill would simply stop turning due to lack of torque. It would not drill through more than one stud without removing the wood chips, where my Hitachi had no problem. I'll keep this drill for the special uses, but not try to use it for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: drill
customer_reviews.text: Dh was very happy with it...had wanted one for a while, and picked this one after checking several out at the stores. Good pricce, came quickly
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased with this purchase. I am too because the honey do list is easier to complete!!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great DeWalt tool...especially for tight spaces. Glad my wife got it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Everett H.

customer_reviews.title: Non Concentric Chuck Problem
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a defective unit, but this Drill's Chuck has severe Run Out. Very noticeable on long drills and you can visibly see the Chuck spin out of round. After replacement I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Rural Valley

customer_reviews.title: Great drill if you need a right angle.
customer_reviews.text: I have always found a reason not to purchase a right angle drill. I don't know why I waited. This drill is great.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Petty

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Right Angle Drill Kit
customer_reviews.text: The overall weight balance, length, and grip surface were very good. Power under various situations was more than adequate for my use. I have not used this drill long enough to testify to its durability, but I believe it will perform as well as my other Dewalt tools. This drill completes the Dewalt variable speed drill and hammer drill set that I purchased recently. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: grandorb

customer_reviews.title: awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: very handy tool plenty of power love the case it came in wish i had another battery in kit very specific design and it shows when using
customer_reviews.author: Brandon powell

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed in the gravity sandblaster
customer_reviews.text: Most of the products I have bought work well and I use some of then often. I was a little disappointed in the gravity sandblaster. I thought that the main part would have been made out of metal instead of plastic and I have to keep shaking it to get the media through.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We use this angle drill on household projects. Its light weight and adequate power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DEWALT 20V MAX Right Angle Cordless Drill/Driver Kit (DCD740C1)
product_meta.description: Style:Drill/Driver SetComfortable, Compact and Portable . Ideal for DIY household use, this tool has a dual speed that ranges (0-600/0-2000) RPM for an increased user flexibility. Providing a wide range of applications, the DEWALT 20V MAX Right Angle Cordless Drill/Driver Kit is portable and can be carried anywhere. Lightweight yet sturdy, this hand tool by DEWALT is optimal for repetitive work and overhead tasks. Easy to Operate . A comfortable and soft grip adds comfort and control to this lightweight and cordless driver, reducing effort and making it easier to work for longer periods of time. For further ease of operation, this power tool is compact that allows you to fit into hard-to-reach spaces. The multi-grip trigger also provides utmost comfort and convenience.
feature_bullets: Dual speed ranges (0-600/0-2000) RPM for increased user flexibility provides a wide range of applications
Compact front-to-back length (4 inches) allows users to fit into hard-to-reach spaces
Multi-grip trigger provides comfort and convenience, allowing the user to get into tighter spaces
Light weight at only 3.9 pounds to minimize user fatigue
Powered by an Energy Star-qualified charger for a better environment

specifications.Warranty Description: Three-year limited warranty, one-year free service, 90-day money-back guarantee
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars300 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
